name: Where'sa That Mushroom! Beta
description:
Mushroom, Night, Ground Theme, Japanese video game version. These 4 things combined get you the bane of all who dare request it.

This bloody mushroom. Moves on its own, jumps on command. The recipe for hell. So, try to traverse through the level, and make your way to Mario, who is getting madder at the second.

Controls: Space to Jump. Z to Speed Up Game, LShift + Z to Boost Game.
